body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, this is Ronald Edwards from Stellar Motors. May I ask for your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Ronald, my name is Michelle Perry.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Michelle. Can you please provide me with your date of birth in the format day month year?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's the third of July nineteen eighty two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Michelle. Lastly, can you confirm the first four digits of your contact number, one by one?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's eight seven six five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Michelle. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, thank you. I'm happy with the service provided.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Michelle. Thank you for your time. Have a wonderful day!
